description: Bessel polynomials y_n(x) (see A001498) evaluated at 2.
comments: Numerators of successive convergents to e using continued fraction 1+2/(1+1/(6+1/(10+1/(14+1/(18+1/(22+1/26...)))))).Number of ways to use the elements of {1,..,k}, n<=k<=2n, once each to form a collection of n lists, each having length 1 or 2. - Bob Proctor, Apr 18 2005, Jun 26 2006
